div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 190px; padding-top: 320px; margin-left: 180px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; width: 180px; height: 190px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
